summary:
$LAI now live on - LayerAI aims to provide the blockchain technology to states, banks, financial startups, or individual users around the world.

 AI2Earn VPN - Upcoming data-capturing VPN that lets you monetize the data you contribute across the web.

 KyotoX Exchange - Decentralized Exchange for the AI Economy

 AI2Earn Store - Product coming soon...

 Data Marketplace - Product coming soon...

 Layer Marketplace - Layer Marketplace is the gateway for retail users to earn by browsing. It allows to buy and sell data capsules - that allow to monetize your behavioral data.

 AI Data Capsule NFT (40/40 Fractions) Minting - Data Capsules allow to monetize your behavioral data. Up until this point, our ecosystem stakers compiled fractions to redeem data capsules.

 VPN Mainnet - AI-2-Earn Goes Live - Personal Finance Superapp for decentralized Meet the 1st free institutional- level VPN that pays you for browsing.

 KyotoX AI Finance Hub - Personal Finance Superapp for decentralized AI projects.

 Multiply your stakes - Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Donec sed odio dui.

 Meet the Infrastructure for the Artificial Intelligence Boom - Built on CryptoGPT $GPT

 LayerAI is the layer-2 that is the dedicated blockchain for AI development. - More AI capsules held gives you more cashflowing earnings yield.

 Scalable Layer-2 - LayerAI is a layer-2 that uses zkRollup technology.

 Truly Distributed - LayerAI is carefully designed to be a network uncontrollable by centralized influence.

 Totally Limitless - Immensely scalable, ultra low-cost transactions combine with empowering infrastructure – data capsules, AI tooling, pluggable earn launcher – to create a blockchain that can expand the abilities of the global economy with the economics of AI.

 Q4 2023 - Launchpad for AI projects

 Q1 2024 - DARTUM Reward Token Launch

 Q2 2024 - Mainnet of LayerAI Network

 Join the AI Revolution - Thank you! Your submission has been received!
